GSD.description:
scsi: sg: Allow waiting for commands to complete on removed device

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 408bfa1489a3cfe7150b81ab0b0df99b23dd5411. For more details please see the references link.
